title: 86/7/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 January 1986 amending for the first time Decision 85/632/EEC on certain protective measures against foot-and-mouth disease in Italy
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 January 1986
amending for the first time Decision 85/632/EEC on certain protective measures against foot-and-mouth disease in Italy
(86/7/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall amend the measures which they apply to trade so as to bring them into compliance with this Decision three days after its notification. They will immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 January 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 24.
(4) OJ No L 47, 21. 2. 1980, p. 4.
(5) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1985.
ANNEX
1. Parts of the territory which are the subject of restriction on the trade in live animals:
- the provinces of Firenze, Pistoia and Verona,
- in the province of Reggio Emilia, Local Health Units 9, 11 and 12,
- in the province of Modena, Local Health Units 14, 16 and 26 and the northern part of Local Health Unit 17 delimited in the south by a line drawn from west to east from the junction of its border with that of Local Health Units 12 and 13,
- any other part of territory situated witin a radius of 10 kilometres around any outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease recorded after 13 December 1985.
2. Parts of the territory which are the subject of restrictions on the trade in fresh meat and meat products:
any part of the territory situated within a radius of 10 kilometres around any outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease reorded after 1 November 1985.
